product_name: Topeak Peak Master Blaster DX II Mini Pump
long_description: The Topeak Peak Master Blaster DX II mini bike pump works well on the road or on the trail. SmartHead(TM) works with both Presta and Schrader valves without swapping heads. Folding T-handle with Kraton grip provides great leverage and comfort while pumping. Double, all-alloy body is durable. Efficient single-action design inflates to 90psi. The Topeak Peak Master Blaster DX II mini bike pump can be mounted to water bottle bosses with the included mount.
short_description: The Topeak Peak Master Blaster DX II mini bike pump works well on the road or on the trail.
